# List of wars involving the Principality of Tver

This is a list of wars involving the Principality of Tver (1246–1485), centred around the city of Tver., (, ). English adjective and demonym: Tverian or Tverite. In primary sources such as the Tver Chronicle and the Word of Praise for the Grand Prince Boris Aleksandrovich'', it is also referred to as the "Grand Principality of Tver" () or the "Tverian Land" (), which was supposedly an equal part of the larger "Rus' Land" (), alongside the "Muscovite Land" () and other grand principalities in northeastern Rus'.}}
